Databricks
===========

![databrickswidget.png](./icons/databrickswidget.png)

Reads data from Databricks.

Signals
-------

- (None)

**Outputs**:

- Data: dataset from Databricks

Description
-----------

The **Databricks** widget accesses data stored in Databricks.

You will need to supply the following settings in order to connect and query your Databricks instance.

1. [Host](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/integrations/compute-details)
2. [HTTP Path](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/integrations/compute-details)
3. [Token](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/dev-tools/auth/pat#azure-databricks-personal-access-tokens-for-workspace-users)
4. [Catalog](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/catalogs/)
5. [Schema](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/schemas/)
6. [Query](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-ref.html)
